entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
